label: A3B2C_hR6_166_ac_c_b-001
title: Ta$_{2}$VC$_{2}$ Structure
comments:
All of the sites here are in some way disordered: 
 The (1a) site is 2/3 tantalum and 1/3 vanadium.  We have arbitrarily labeled this as vanadium. 
 The C I (1b) and C II (2c) sites are occupied 2/3 of the time. 
 The second (2c) site is also 2/3 tantalum and 1/3 vanadium, and we have arbitrarily labeled it as tantalum. 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_hR6_166_ac_bc-001}{$\epsilon$-Hf$_{3}$N$_{2}$} is the binary form of this structure. 
 Hexagonal settings of this structure can be obtained with the option {\tt --hex}.
